name: SKY MARKETING CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to market access for the hemp plant and hemp-derived constituents.
Issues related to market access for the hemp plant and hemp-derived constituents.
Ensuring the market remains open for U.S. grown hemp-containing finished goods, to include hemp cannabinoids and minor cannabinoids.
